upw.patientId=upf.patientId LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.patientId,u.familyName,u.patientRelation,u.familyPhone,u.createTime,u.address,u.isValid FROM user_db.u_patient_family u WHERE u.patientId=#{patientId} AND u.isValid = 1 ORDER BY u.createTime DESC) upf1 ON upw.patientId=upf1.patientId AND upf1.createTime is null LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.patientId,u.familyName,u.patientRelation,u.familyPhone,u.createTime,u.address,u.isValid FROM user_db.u_patient_family u WHERE u.patientId=#{patientId} ORDER BY u.createTime DESC) upf11 ON upw.patientId=upf11.patientId AND upf11.createTime is null LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.patientId,u.familyName,u.patientRelation,u.familyPhone,u.createTime,u.address,u.isValid FROM user_db.u_patient_family u WHERE u.patientId=#{patientId} AND u.isDefault != 1 and u.isValid = 1 ORDER BY u.createTime DESC) upf2 ON upw.patientId=upf2.patientId AND (upf.createTime IS NOT NULL OR upf1.createTime IS NOT NULL OR (SELECT u.patientId,u.familyName,u.patientRelation,u.familyPhone,u.createTime,u.address,u.isValid FROM user_db.u_patient_family u WHERE u.patientId=#{patientId} AND u.isDefault != 1 and u.isValid = 1 ORDER BY u.createTime ASC) upf3 ON upw.patientId=upf3.patientId AND upf2.createTime IS NOT NULL and (upf3.familyName != upf2.familyName OR upf3.familyPhone != upf2.familyPhone) LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.patientId,u.familyName,u.patientRelation,u.familyPhone,u.createTime,u.address,u.isValid FROM user_db.u_patient_family u WHERE u.patientId=#{patientId} AND u.isDefault != 1 and u.isValid != 1 ORDER BY u.createTime DESC) upf22 ON upw.patientId=upf22.patientId AND (upf.createTime IS NOT NULL OR upf1.createTime IS NOT NULL OR upf11.createTime IS NOT NULL) AND upf2.createTime IS NULL and (upf2.familyName NOT IN(upf.familyName,upf1.familyName,upf11.familyName) OR upf2.familyPhone NOT IN(upf.familyPhone,upf1.familyPhone,upf11.familyPhone)) LEFT JOIN (SELECT u.patientId,u.familyName,u.patientRelation,u.familyPhone,u.createTime,u.address,u.isValid FROM user_db.u_patient_family u WHERE u.patientId=#{patientId} AND u.isDefault != 1 and u.isValid != 1 ORDER BY u.createTime ASC) upf33 ON upw.patientId=upf33.patientId AND (upf2.createTime IS NOT NULL OR upf22.createTime IS NOT NULL) AND upf3.createTime IS NULL and (upf33.familyName NOT IN(upf2.familyName,upf22.familyName) OR upf33.familyPhone NOT IN(upf2.familyPhone,upf22.familyPhone)) where patientId=#{patientId} limit 1
